Title: The Weekend
Plot: The relationship between Carrie and Brody becomes more complicated when they head into the countryside for the weekend, while Mike and Jessica face the fallout of the truth about their relationship, and Saul catches Aileen on the run to Mexico.
ParentalRatingReason: R16 Violence,sexual references and offensive language
GuestStars: Amy Hargreaves, Hrach Titizian, Marin Ireland, Joe Ward, Bridget Gethins, Taylor Kowalski, Chelsea Cardwell
